channel.title: Ambient on Jesús Pérez
channel.description: Recent content in Ambient on Jesús Pérez

item.title: Interesting things I saw this week - 13
item.description: This week was the definition of dead. Here is the only thing worth sharing that I saw this week and the corresponding music recommendation. [podcast] Private Suite Podcast : Vapor Memory Interview: This was an incredible find, I didn’t know there was a podcast dedicated to vaporwave until Vapor Memory uploaded this interview on his channel. Being the go-to channel to discover vaporwave on youtube, Vapor Memory is a very well known name in the vaporwave community, a name I would say as well known as some of the older and well established vaporwave artists.

item.title: Interesting things I saw this week - 7
item.description: Last week I commented some things about the first few chapters of The omnivore’s dilemma, this week I finished reading the first part, the one about the industrial food chain, and there are some more things to be said about it. In chapter 8 the author talks about how the omnivore’s dilemma1 is solved by culture: One eats what one’s parents eat, they eat what their parents ate and so on; through generations cultural eating habits are formed, and those habits are generally sufficient to keep most people healthy.
